description: This header file defines the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface for managing local data storage using SQLite3. It includes method declarations for opening the database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, and removing entries.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class implementing ILocalStore to manage local SQLite database storage, providing methods for CRUD operations and query building.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a database connection at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the local database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a specified range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches entries from a table starting from a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries within a specified range from a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.

methods.name: buildGetEventsQuery
methods.description: Constructs an SQL query string to retrieve event entries from a table.
